Module info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev
Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.iterative

Class TasksManager<R>

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.iterative.TasksManager<R>
Type Parameters:
R - result type
public class TasksManager<R> extends Object
Manages the Task and their results. Stores tasks' results, occurred exceptions and the tasks counter, which indicates how many tasks are not done yet.
Author:
Dunaev Kirill

      public TasksManager(int size)

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • result

      public void result(int index, R value)
      Saves the result of the task with the given index.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the task
      value - result

    • exception

      public void exception(RuntimeException e)
      Adds an exception. If it's a first exception added, then class will store it. Otherwise, the exception is added suppressed to the stored one.
      Parameters:
      e - an exception to add

    • done

      public void done()
      Decrements the task counter. If it reaches zero, calls notify.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the counter has already reached zero

    • waitResults

      public List<R> waitResults() throws InterruptedException
      Waits until tasks counter reaches zero and returns the results or throws the stored exception.
      Returns:
      tasks' results
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if this thread is interrupted
      RuntimeException - there is an exception stored
